additional.title: Complete Transparency with Sandi Integration
additional.desc: Our platform uses blockchain technology to create an immutable record of every transaction, ensuring complete transparency from donor to beneficiary while integrating with Qatar's national Sandi platform.

features: Integrated with Sandi to prevent duplicate aid distribution
RACA approved and monitored campaigns with full oversight
Regular impact reports with photos, videos, and beneficiary stories
Blockchain-verified transaction records for complete auditability
note: All donations are processed securely and are tax-deductible in Qatar
